name: Red-do
description:
Red-Do is a Visual-Novel game, telling the story of a Hikikomori that wanted to change his life for the better

Story

Being bullied in his childhood, the main character decided to become a hikikomori to avoid all the people that humiliated him. One day, he was sick of his lifestyle and wanted to change his life around and live like a normal person. Our story begins with the main character trying to get used to social life and find his place in the society

Features Relationship Level

Relationship level indicate how close your relationship with someone (of course). You can increase your Relationship level by :

  • Doing side mission
  • Choosing the right dialogue from conversation

With higher relationship level, you can unlock special side story with the characters and learn more about the characters

Communication Skills

Communication Skills indicate how good you are communicating with people. This point can be earned by :

  • Initiating main story
  • Talking with other people
  • Choosing the right dialogue from conversation

Communication Skills are needed for player to unlock the main story of the characters

Player must choose their dialogue to procced with the main story
Gain Communication skill by selecting the right dialogue
